lines.text: So, everything was normal, Slick shot the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard,</c> he died...
But then the goat pulled out his silenced revolver, and-
Oh, don't give me that! Disposing of the evidence? You're a goat!
You could've just eaten the revolver when you were done!
That's the weakest excuse I've ever heard!
Thumbs, schmumbs! You could use your tongue, or something!
I don't know! I don't have to prove the exact method!
It's a Devil's Proof! I can just propose Mystery Tongue Maneuver X, and...
Yeah, I'm gonna back the goat on this one.
You always take %THEIR% side! No fair!
